nodes.text: Blizzard One, alternatively spelled Blizzard 1, was an All Terrain Armored Transport which served as General Maximilian Veers' personal walker during the Battle of Hoth, as part of the Blizzard Force unit. From the cockpit of Blizzard One, Veers led the Imperial assault on Echo Base, the Hothian headquarters of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Although the general's walker managed to destroy the massive shield generator that powered Echo Base, Blizzard One was decapitated when an enemy T-47 airspeeder flown by Rebel pilot Derek Klivian crashed into its cockpit.
